name: Santa's Little Intern
description:
This project was created as a submission for the Finally Finish Something 2023 Game Jam. 

Originaly, i wanted to post this project in Godot Wild Jam 53, but can't finish it on time. Theme of that Godot Wild Jam was "Assembly Required" and i want to use 2 "Wildcards": "Plot Twist" and " Thermometr as game mechanic".

This game about little elf who want to work on Santa's Factory and create toys for children, but eventualy he got job in basement, where he need to heat Factory and can practice in assembling toys by stacking unwanted materials in boxes.

Controls:

You need to use mouse in menus and WSAD\Arrows in Game.
